Class GlobalState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • com.timerunner.states.GlobalState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class GlobalState
extends BasicGameState
    The Class GlobalState. Add common usage to all states.

      • pauseState

        public void pauseState(int pauseId,
              int id,
              Transition leave,
              Transition enter)
        Pause a particular game state with the transitions provided.
        Parameters:
        pauseId - the id of the state to pause
        id - The ID of the state to enter
        leave - The transition to use when leaving the current state
        enter - The transition to use when entering the new state
